channel.title: Looking for Client sided programmar
channel.description:
hey guys, i am starting a new server development, (have not yet thought off a name yet) i am looking for Client Developers. this is the base "Project insanity."
features.
Fairly accurate accuracy formulas (tweaked a lot) Fully functional clan chat 3/4 godwar bosses Amazing npc drop system Fight Pits Pest Control Barrows Fight Caves (360 onwards, easy to add all ways, just build on the array) Quite a few skills (some half-assed) All 474 items (loaded through cache) Most pots work, very easy to add more Most food work, very east to add more 100% Potion dose mixing Base for skill menus Piety + chivalry Perfect prayer draining Custom infinity/mage book minigame Working obelisks Perfect prayer draining and protection prayer delay in pvp
[IMG]http://imgur.com/NhLuA.png[/img]
Waiting list! extremex-scape.
Spots Open. Client Coder- X Entinity X Forum programmar-
[code] MOPAR NAME- MSN- WHAT SPOT YOUR GOING FOR- AGE- [/code]

item.title: Looking for Client sided programmar
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:1, topic:392466”]MOPAR NAME - Read?
MSN - Intoxicated-2oz@hotmail.com - Might not work i’ll check.
WHAT SPOT YOUR GOING FOR - Client& Server Programmer.
AGE - 14
EXPERIENCE - Almost 2 1/2 Years, (Will be in June)
Pm me with server info and etc…[/quote]
Added into, the “waiting list”, thank-you for your application!.
